src_original: 5.04.045 apa=ā-dān-e ca=a-hīya-ruh-ḥ  5.04.046 ati-grah-a=a-vyath-ana=kṣepe-ṣu a-kar-tar-i tṛ-tīyā-y-āḥ  5.04.047 hī-ya-m-āna-pāpa-yog-āt=ca
5.04.048 ṣaṣ-ṭhy-ā vy-ā-śray-e  5.04.049 rog-āt=ca=apa-nay-an-e  5.04.050 kṛ=bhū=as-ti-yog-e sam-pad-ya-ar-tar-i Cviḥ

5.04.052 vibhāṣā sāti kārt-sn-y-e  5.04.053 abhi-vi-dh-au sam-pad-ā ca  5.04.054 tad-adh-īna-vac-an-e  5.04.055 de-y-e trā ca  5.04.056 deva-manuṣya-puruṣa-puru-martye-hyaḥ dvi-tīy-ā-apta-y-or bahulam
